name: Nekromanteía (DEMO)
description:
Nekromanteia is an isometric 2D stealth game set in Nazi-Occupied Greece during World War II. You Play as Theofanis, a recently resurrected resistance fighter, who is granted special abilities by Thanatos, the God of Death. His mission: Learn why Hypnos, the God of Dreams, is working with the Nazis, and put a stop to whatever evil scheme they’ve cooked up.

Development Team: 

Jennifer Ai - Programmer

Ben Fickes - Programmer

Aslanta Chen - Character/UI Artist

Andre De Oliveira - Environment Artist

Julia Smead - Level Designer

Neal Cox - Producer/Designer
